content:
The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg. 

[Question] What was your initial offer for the rental price?
[Answer] My initial offer for the rental price was €600 per month. 

[Question] How did the landlord respond to your initial offer?
[Answer] The landlord responded that he didn't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer was too low. He was looking for a higher price to rent out his property. 

[Question] What was your next offer for the rental price?
[Answer] My next offer for the rental price was €650 per month. 

[Question] How did the landlord respond to your next offer?
[Answer] The landlord responded that he didn't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer was still too low. He was looking for a higher price to rent out his property. 

[Question] What was your next offer for the rental price?
[Answer] My next offer for the rental price was €680 per month. 

[Question] How did the landlord respond to your next offer?
[Answer] The landlord responded that he didn't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer was still not high enough. He was looking for a higher price to rent out his property. 

[Question] What was your final offer for the rental price?
[Answer] My final offer for the rental price was €695 per month. 

[Question] How did the landlord respond to your final offer?
[Answer] The landlord responded that he didn't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer was still not high enough. He was looking for a higher price to rent out his property.
